abstract: Uighur ethnic suicide bomber sets off an explosive device attached to his body, killing eight people and wounding at least seven, in an impoverished area of China that borders India and Pakistan, according to unconfirmed report by Radio Free Asia.
lead_paragraph: At least seven people were said to have been injured in an attack by a young Uighur, which could not be independently confirmed and was not reported by the Chinese news media.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber Kills Up to 8 in Xinjiang, Radio Free Asia Reports
headline.print_headline: China: Deadly Violence Reported in Xinjiang Region

snippet: At least seven people were said to have been injured in an attack by a young Uighur, which could not be independently confirmed and was not reported by the Chinese news media.
